The issue is the path of our class is too long. 
Looks the jar under window don't support such long file name.
Build team need to research if this a general limitation or we can resolve by our JDK or OS enviroment.

Other team has no this problem. GUI team call Eclipse ant to generate build script, this auto-generated build script creates a very deep folder structure, it causes the full names of some files are too long for Jar under Windows.
This is a special case for GUI.

This is not special case.
That's a general case for all code. 
For now, only GUI has the code path exceed the length limitation. But potentail, other team can have also.
Please try under linux enviroment.
*** Bug 134010 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
*** Bug 134012 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
*** Bug 134026 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
Use JDK1.5 to build. This issue has gone. Fixed.
